name: Impale
description: A devastating stab to the vitals inflicting instant damage and causing your target to bleed for #N/A - #N/A + #N/A% Weapon Damage until the target is either fully healed or they drop below a certain health threshold. Effects scale with Pips spend. 1 Pip: 125 - 188 and Bleed until under 90% Health. 2 Pips: 250 - 376 and Bleed until under 80% Health. 3 Pips: 375 - 564 and Bleed until under 70% Health. 4 Pips: 500 - 762 and Bleed until under 60% Health. 5 Pips: 625 - 940 and Bleed until under 50% Health.
